Has no sound in Windows Vista. A little help, please?

To anyone who get the sound problem on 7/vista:

This is what you should do->
Download the plugins at
http://www.esnips.com/web/mugensoundfix

and the config part2

1. you just have to move the plugins to the folder plugin in the mugen directory

then you must replace the mugen.cfg text in the torrent between 

; Sound configuration (Windows)
...
;-------------------------------------------------------
[Misc]
for the one in the cfg from the file you dowloaded...

enjoy!

I successfully got it working on windows 7. I have no idea hoq but I was able to get the files from esnips. In the first download, you put the files from the zip file into the plugin folder. For the cfg file, you copy the text starting at ; Sound configuration (Windows) all the way to the ;-------------------------------------------------------
[Misc]

and then you replace that same part in cfg file from your mugen. I could make a video if anyone needs some help.
